Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    An AudioPlayer is a class that will play sound. An AudioPlayer allows for music to be played in the game's background.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioPlayer

        public AudioPlayer(float volume)
            throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Runs the Menu constructor.
        Parameters:
        volume - required to determine volume of the music
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - throws an exception if the file does not exist
        java.io.IOException - throws an exception if the file is not playable
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - throws an exception if there was an error reading the file
